item.title: Shiny:: select input controlled by previous and next button
item.description: If you ever need to provide a select input in shiny that must be controlled by a previous and a forward button, you may consider using the following piece of code. A possible use case is to allow user to browse through different product with having to click on the dropdown menu and select the desired item. For a long list, this manual process can be tedious and a previous/forward button pair would make more sense.
